integrated_explanation_engine.mixer_01: The mixer cannot be turned on after 22:00
integrated_explanation_engine.deep_fryer_01: Since the cooker hood is not turned on, the deep fryer cannot be turned on.
integrated_explanation_engine.lamp_01: The lamp is turned on because the room is dark.
integrated_explanation_engine.mixer_speed_01: The mixer speed was automatically reduced to Low for safety after 22:00 to prevent noise complaints from neighbors.
